title: Gifting My Friend
body: I am trying to gift my friend and  he has been on my friends list for longer than a day but when i click the gift button his name doesnt show up it says No items matched your search criteria.

replies.body:
I think I see the issue you two are having. While you've been friends for more than 24 hours which _is_ one of the requirements, one of the other stipulations for gifting is that you yourself need to be at least level 10 before you're able to send skins/champs/rune pages and level 15 to send gift RP. 

Be sure to check out our [**gifting faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) for all the stipulations, and hit me back up if you run into any other issues.
